name: DET Warning
description: Warn designers when an element is used in a DET and changes to it may have complications.

authors.name: Adam Nunez
authors.institution: UW Madison - Center for Tobacco Research and Intervention

system-settings.name: Prevent end-users from reviewing the DET code

project-settings.name:
This module will warn you if a data element you are editing in the designer is being used in the project's DET.
Note: Data elements are only searched for in the file immediately listed, imports are not checked. The file is scanned once a day for changes, to force a re-scan clear the below configuration.

Click here to view all saved configuration.
